name: generate
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool payment_card_numbers_generator.
Tool description: A simple service to generate random credit/debit card numbers
API description: # Generate payment card numbers

## Default values

**scheme**: "visa"
**count**: 5

quantity.description: The number of payment card numbers to generate. Defaults to 5.

scheme.description: The scheme of the payment card numbers (e.g., 'visa', 'mastercard'). If not specified, defaults to None.
